Initialize Beta Coefficients Using Design Matrix

Source: R/beta.R
init_beta.Rd

Initializes regression coefficients using QR decomposition of the design matrix and normalized log counts.

Usage

init_beta(y, design_matrix, offset_matrix)

Arguments

y

Count data matrix

design_matrix

Matrix of predictor variables

offset_matrix

Matrix of offset values

Value

Matrix of initial beta coefficients
